thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Attitude Property Ltd Posts HY Pretax Profit Of 67.3 Mln Rupees

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Attitude Property Ltd Posts HY Pretax Profit Of 67.3 Mln Rupees

organizations.name: brief-attitude property ltd posts hy pretax

text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Attitude Property Ltd:
* HY PROFIT BEFORE TAXATION OF 67.3 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 64.19 MILLION RUPEES
* HY EARNINGS PER SHARE 0.35 RUPEES * NAV PER SHARE AS AT DECEMBER 31, 2017 WAS RS 10.45 * HY REVENUE OF RS 94.86 MILLION VERSUS RS 92.98 MILLION Source: bit.ly/2C3NhDi Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
